channel.title: A Gyani - Articles
channel.description: A page to express thoughts, share ideas and finally a transformation from Agyani to A Gyani!

item.title: My First job experience :)
item.description: What happens when you don’t understand the things taught by a teacher in the class? You ask your friend to explain and then the miracle happens, the equations which were taught by a highly qualified professional didn’t get into your head but you completely grasp the whole scenario when taught by a person just like you!

item.title: The Virtual Resource pool
item.description: I have seen few HR people on LinkedIn discussing the poor joining ratios and asking why some candidates don’t pick up their calls after the interview schedules.

item.title: Buddhi and Gyani
item.description: A similar type of story was narrated to me by a teacher of mine on the account of me acting an over-smart: Henceforth this >story has been a torchbearer calming me and showing me my height periodically.
